Item ID1951

Redberries are items used for creating dyes and making redberry pie. Even though they are used in Cooking, they cannot be eaten unless made into a pie.

Contents

  • 1 Locations
  • 2 Products
  • 3 Uses
  • 4 Item sources
    • 4.1 Shop locations
  • 5 Quests Used In

Locations[edit | edit source]

  • Sold at Wydin's Food Store in Port Sarim
  • Can be picked from the two redberry bushes near the South-east Varrock mine. Two berries may be picked from each bush. They take 2 minutes to regrow.
  • Redberries can also be grown with the Farming skill at level 10 in any bush patch. Four berries can be picked from this bush granting 4.5 Farming experience each. One seed can produce a minimum of 4 berries, where the Farming level reduces the chance of using up one of the three "lives" of the patch, much like harvesting herb patches.
  • 2 bushes at Land's End next to the Flax spawns.
  • Redberries can be stolen from the Fruit Stall near Xeric's Glade.

Uses[edit | edit source]

  • Making red dyes. Just ask Aggie the witch in Draynor Village to make red dye and bring her three bunches of redberries and 5 coins as a fee.
  • Baking redberry pies; The Knight's Sword quest requires you to make a Redberry pie. It is also required for The Giant Dwarf quest unless completed The Knight's Sword first.
  • Making a paste during Prince Ali Rescue.
  • Used in Goblin Diplomacy to make the orange dye by mixing the red/yellow dyes.
  • Possible item for the Item List of Thorgel, the dwarf at the end of Mourning's end part 2 quest, in exchange for a death talisman.
  • Requirement for one of the possible dyes needed for Ghost's Ahoy.
  • One is required for The Hand in the Sand.
  • Recolouring the Rocky pet.
A redberry bush.

[[File:Redberries detail.png|left|150px]]
'''Redberries''' are items used for creating [[dyes]] and making [[redberry pie]]. Even though they are used in [[Cooking]], they cannot be eaten unless made into a pie.

==Locations==
*Sold at [[Wydin's Food Store]] in [[Port Sarim]]
*Can be picked from the two redberry bushes near the [[South-east Varrock mine]]. Two berries may be picked from each bush. They take 2 minutes to regrow.
*Redberries can also be grown with the [[Farming]] [[skill]] at level 10 in any [[Farming/Patch locations#Bush patches|bush patch]]. Four berries can be picked from this bush granting 4.5 Farming [[experience]] each. One seed can produce a minimum of 4 berries, where the Farming level reduces the chance of using up one of the three "lives" of the patch, much like harvesting [[herb patch]]es.
*2 bushes at [[Land's End]] next to the [[Flax]] spawns.
*Redberries can be stolen from the [[Fruit Stall]] near [[Xeric's Glade]].
==Products==
{{Uses material list|Redberries}}
==Uses==
*Making [[red dye]]s. Just ask [[Aggie]] the witch in [[Draynor Village]] to make red dye and bring her three bunches of redberries and 5 [[coins]] as a fee.
*Baking [[redberry pie]]s; [[The Knight's Sword]] quest requires you to make a Redberry pie. It is also required for [[The Giant Dwarf]] quest unless completed The Knight's Sword first.
*Making a [[paste]] during [[Prince Ali Rescue]].
*Used in [[Goblin Diplomacy]] to make the [[orange dye]] by mixing the red/[[yellow dye]]s.
*Possible item for the Item List of Thorgel, the dwarf at the end of Mourning's end part 2 quest, in exchange for a death talisman.
*Requirement for one of the possible dyes needed for [[Ghosts Ahoy|Ghost's Ahoy]].
*One is required for [[The Hand in the Sand]].
*Recolouring the [[Rocky]] pet.

[[File:Redberry bush.png|thumb|right|120px|A redberry bush.]]
